s49.message: Moved several hardcoded lists to preferences

s36.message: Selecting active locale on startup in Mozilla and SeaMonkey to fix installer's bad choice

s24.message: Sidebar: Splitting up long addresses into multiple rows in the tooltip

s22.message: Sidebar: Tooltip showing more information now

s9.message: Added translations: Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, Chinese Simplified, French, Danish, British English, Portuguese, Swedish, Chinese Traditional

s17.message: Preferences dialog: Added an Edit menu

s56.message: Filters starting with http:// or https:// no longer match only at the beginning of the address

s3.message: Counting how often each filter gets applied — resulting hit count visible in the Preferences dialog

s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 0.6.1:

s27.message: Add subscription dialog: Made subscription title first input field

s7.message: Filter list now stored in adblockplus/patterns.ini in the profile directory instead of prefs.js

s6.message: Vastly extended element hiding syntax — limiting by domain, attribute selectors, raw CSS

s5.message: Optimized processing of long filter lists, 5000 filters work without a noticeable slowdown (doesn't work for regular expressions)

s4.message: Added possibility to disable individual filters, not only complete subscriptions

s57.message: Starting filters with | makes them match only at the beginning of the address, finishing them with | makes them match only at the end

s13.message: Preferences dialog: Added copy and paste for filters

s54.message: Fixed: Switching profiles at runtime in Mozilla and SeaMonkey isn't handled properly

s53.message: Fixed: Performance issues on pages with many occurences of the same address

s52.message: Fixed: Memory leak happening with Gecko 1.8 (not Gecko 1.9) when "Show tabs on Flash and Java" is activated

s51.message: Fixed: Blockable items list would show all visited pages, not just the current (mainly on Linux)

s12.message: Preferences dialog: Filters and subscriptions can be reordered via drag and drop

s26.message: Sidebar: Making sure to scroll to the item when flashing its borders (can be disabled via preference extensions.adblockplus.flash_scrolltoitem)

s11.message: Preferences dialog: Added filter search (also find-as-you-type if enabled in browser)

s59.message: Made sure there is no way for web sites to detect Adblock Plus

s58.message: Fixed file permission problems when installing on Linux in Mozilla Suite/SeaMonkey

s18.message: Preferences dialog: Added Help button (opens FAQ)

s39.message: Fixed: When switching to an already open Preferences dialog suggestion isn't filled in and the filter is not selected

s38.message: Fixed: Cannot open Preferences when either About or Subscription dialog is open

s35.message: Preferences extensions.adblockplus.sidebar_key, extensions.adblockplus.setting_key and extensions.adblockplus.enable_key now define the keyboard shortcut for opening/closing sidebar, opening preferences and enabling/disabling

s34.message: Preferences extensions.adblockplus.defaulttoolbaraction and extensions.adblockplus.defaultstatusbaraction now define the action for left-click on toolbar/status bar icon

s37.message: Fixed: Don't allow to add filters via "Disable on ..." while the Preferences dialog is open

s10.message: Preferences dialog: Made filter list a multi-column tree

s31.message: "Show in status bar" switched off by default

s16.message: Preferences dialog: Element hiding rules are shown as invalid when used in a browser that doesn't support them (Gecko 1.7 and lower)

s15.message: Preferences dialog: Showing element hiding rules and invalid rules (mainly wrong regular expressions) in separate groups

s14.message: Preferences dialog: The list can be sorted by any column now

s20.message: Sidebar: Can be filtered by address or type text

s33.message: Remembering now whether Preferences dialog/detached sidebar were maximized and restoring state when reopened

s32.message: Toolbar icon now visible in Mozilla and SeaMonkey in the personal toolbar

s30.message: Added an option to show/hide toolbar icon

s25.message: Sidebar: Current state is saved when detaching/reattaching

s23.message: Sidebar: Images and background images are displayed in the tooltip for easier identifying (can be disabled via preference extensions.adblockplus.previewimages)

s48.message: Added interface IAdblockPlus to be used by other extensions (for example to manage external subscriptions)

s21.message: Sidebar: Added filter and state columns (not shown by default)

s45.message: Only exception rules starting with http:// or https:// will whitelist entire pages, other rules apply to individual items only

s46.message: Saving daily backups of patterns.ini (max. 5 backups by default)

s47.message: {1} in subscription addresses is replaced by current Adblock Plus version when updating, e.g. {2}

s40.message: Fixed: Spaces shouldn't be stripped from subscription address/file name

s41.message: Fixed: Detached sidebar wouldn't save state in Firefox 1.0/Mozilla 1.7

s42.message: Allowed blocking background images via context menu

s43.message: Made it possible to drag images/links to the toolbar icon as well, not just the status bar

s50.message: Choosing which schemes can be blocked with a whitelist (extensions.adblockplus.whitelistschemes), not a blacklist

s28.message: Add subscription dialog: Added a dropdown list with a few suggestions for subscriptions

s29.message: Whitelisting via menu now allows to whitelist a specific page, not all its subpages as well

s62.message: Flash plugin crashes when Mozilla ActiveX plugin is installed and the option "Show tabs on Flash and Java" in Adblock Plus is activated. It is suggested to deactivate this option.

s61.message: Yahoo Application State plugin (npYState.dll, installed by Yahoo Messenger) causes crashes on Yahoo Mail if Adblock Plus is installed. It is suggested to remove this plugin, its only function seems to be to notify Yahoo Mail about your version of Yahoo Messenger.
